--- format: html: code-fold: show code-summary: "Ocultar código" code-line-numbers: false code-annotations: false code-link: true code-tools: source: true toggle: true caption: "Código" code-overflow: scroll page-layout: full editor_options: chunk_output_type: console categories: - geom_circle execute: eval: false echo: true warning: false title: "Semana 04" date: last-modified author: Víctor Gauto --- Capital accionario de empresas de Brasil, de acuerdo con el tamaño de la compañía. ::: {.column-page-right} ![Semana 04, 2026](semana_04.png) ::: ## Paquetes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(glue) library(ggtext) library(showtext) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Estilos Colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#2c2182" c2 <- "#ffcc00" c3 <- "#00953e" c4 <- "grey90" ``` ::: Fuentes: Ubuntu y JetBrains Mono. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} font_add( family = "ubuntu", regular = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Regular.ttf", bold = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Bold.ttf", italic = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Italic.ttf" ) font_add( family = "jet", regular = "././fuente/JetBrainsMonoNLNerdFontMono-Regular.ttf" ) showtext_auto() showtext_opts(dpi = 300) ``` ::: ## Epígrafe ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fuente <- glue( "Datos: ", "{{tidytuesdayR}} semana 04,
", "Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica, Brazilian Ministry of Finance." ) autor <- glue("**Víctor Gauto**") icon_twitter <- glue("") icon_instagram <- glue("") icon_github <- glue("") icon_mastodon <- glue("󰫑") icon_bsky <- glue("") usuario <- glue("**vhgauto**") sep <- glue("**|**") mi_caption <- glue( "{fuente}
{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2026, 04) companies <- tuesdata$companies ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa comparar el capital accionario de las empresas por tamaño de empresa, como círculos concentricos de radio proporcional al capital. Selecciono los tamaños de empresa, traduzco y asocio colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} comp <- c("small-enterprise", "other", "micro-enterprise") trad_comp <- c("Pequeños emprendimientos", "Otros", "Micro emprendimientos") trad_comp <- setNames(trad_comp, comp) color_comp <- c(c1, c2, c3) color_comp <- setNames(color_comp, comp) ``` ::: Sumo los capitales accionarios por tamaño de empresa, convierto a billones y aplico formato de número, agrego colores y traducciones. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d <- reframe( companies, s = sum(capital_stock), .by = company_size ) |> mutate(r = s / 1e12) |> mutate( company_size = fct( company_size, levels = c(comp) ) ) |> mutate(trad = trad_comp[company_size]) |> mutate(color = color_comp[company_size]) |> mutate( stock = scales::label_number( scale = 1e-12, prefix = "BRL ", big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",", suffix = "B" )(s) ) ``` ::: ## Figura Título y figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} mi_titulo <- glue( "Capital accionario de
empresas brasileras
en billones de reales" ) g <- ggplot( d, aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = r, color = company_size, fill = company_size) ) + ggforce::geom_circle(show.legend = FALSE) + annotate( geom = "richtext", x = c(0, d$r[2], 0), y = c(d$r[1], 0, d$r[3]), label = glue("{d$trad}
{d$stock}"), color = d$color, family = "ubuntu", size = 7, hjust = 0, vjust = c(0, .5, 0), fill = NA, label.color = NA, label.padding = unit(1, "mm"), label.margin = unit(0, "mm") ) + annotate( geom = "richtext", x = I(-.05), y = I(1.05), label = mi_titulo, hjust = 0, vjust = 1, size = 8, family = "ubuntu", fill = NA, label.color = NA, label.padding = unit(0, "mm"), label.margin = unit(0, "mm") ) + scale_fill_manual(values = color_comp) + scale_color_manual(values = color_comp) + coord_equal(expand = FALSE, clip = FALSE) + labs(caption = mi_caption) + theme_void(base_family = "ubuntu") + theme_sub_plot( margin = margin(t = 55), background = element_rect(fill = c4), caption = element_markdown( color = c3, size = 14, margin = margin(b = 10, r = -45), lineheight = 1.3 ) ) ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2026/semana_04.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) ``` :::
